Method Detail

calculateProfitMargin

public double calculateProfitMargin()
Returns:
Calculates the profit margin as a % then assigns it to the profit margin field

checkStandardSellingPrice

public void checkStandardSellingPrice(double _sellingPrice)
Parameters:
_sellingPrice - used to check if the selling price is 25% or higher then the dealer cost and if it is then set it in a double format
